meanings.definition: A group or set of four things
meanings.sent1: In the game, the team was divided into quaternaries for the relay race.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for quaternaries of ingredients to be mixed together.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, the quaternaries of penguins waddled around in unison.
meanings.sent4: The quaternaries of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The quaternaries of seasons bring variety and change throughout the year.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing four atoms of a particular element
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new quaternaries for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the quaternaries under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The quaternaries of oxygen molecules danced together in the reaction.
meanings.sent4: The quaternaries of carbon formed a stable compound in the solution.
meanings.sent5: The quaternaries of hydrogen atoms bonded tightly in the compound structure.
